trans-unit.source: The event argument passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportAuthenticationModule.Authenticate"></xref> event by a <xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量传递给<xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportAuthenticationModule.Authenticate"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.Security.PassportAuthenticationModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Since there is already an identity at this point, this is useful mainly for attaching a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to the context using the supplied identity.
trans-unit.target: 由于已存在一个标识在此点，因此这是主要用于附加自定义<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>使用所提供的标识的上下文的对象。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: This class is deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用。

trans-unit.source: This class has been deprecated and is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 此类已弃用，不再受支持。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Passport Network has been replaced by Windows Live ID.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Passport 网络已替换为通过 Windows Live id。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use Windows Live ID to authenticate users in a Web application, see [Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用 Windows Live ID 的 Web 应用中的用户进行身份验证的详细信息，请参阅[Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346)。
